content: the court of appeals in salerno made a final ruling on an appeal between two parties regarding an inheritance dispute the court ordered the division of the inheritance and the dissolution of the property based on a project prepared by an expert the court also imposed obligations on the parties to pay compensation and confer a donation one party was ordered to pay the other €27000 the court considered legal principles and grounds for the decision including the validity of a donation made by the father an expert was appointed to assess the value of the assets and liabilities of the estate the court considered arguments and evidence from both parties and concluded that the division of the property should be based on two different plans proposed by the expert the court also addressed alleged indirect donations made by the father to the son and included them in the calculations the court ordered one party to pay the other €201025 taking into account interest the court also ordered the parties to share the costs of the proceedings
